commanders.name: Aminatou, the Fateshifter
commanders.oracleText:
[+1]: Draw a card, then put a card from your hand on top of your library.
[−1]: Exile another target permanent you own, then return it to the battlefield under your control.
[−6]: Choose left or right. Each player gains control of all nonland permanents other than Aminatou controlled by the next player in the chosen direction.
Aminatou, the Fateshifter can be your commander.

cards.name: Enigma Sphinx
cards.oracleText:
Flying
When this creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, put it into your library third from the top.
Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.)

cards.name: Serra Avatar
cards.oracleText:
Serra Avatar's power and toughness are each equal to your life total.
When Serra Avatar is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

cards.name: Adarkar Valkyrie
cards.oracleText:
Flying, vigilance
{T}: When target creature other than this creature dies this turn, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

cards.name: Conundrum Sphinx
cards.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever this creature attacks, each player chooses a card name. Then each player reveals the top card of their library. If the card a player revealed has the name they chose, that player puts it into their hand. If it doesn't, that player puts it on the bottom of their library.

cards.name: Djinn of Wishes
cards.oracleText:
Flying
This creature enters with three wish counters on it.
{2}{U}{U}, Remove a wish counter from this creature: Reveal the top card of your library. You may play that card without paying its mana cost. If you don't, exile it.

cards.name: Jeskai Infiltrator
cards.oracleText:
This creature can't be blocked as long as you control no other creatures.
When this creature deals combat damage to a player, exile it and the top card of your library in a face-down pile, shuffle that pile, then manifest those cards. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

cards.name: Sphinx of Jwar Isle
cards.oracleText:
Flying
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
You may look at the top card of your library any time.

cards.name: Sphinx of Uthuun
cards.oracleText:
Flying
When this creature enters, reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

cards.name: Phyrexian Delver
cards.oracleText: When this creature enters, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to that card's mana value.

cards.name: Duskmantle Seer
cards.oracleText:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, each player reveals the top card of their library, loses life equal to that card's mana value, then puts it into their hand.

cards.name: High Priest of Penance
cards.oracleText: Whenever this creature is dealt damage, you may destroy target nonland permanent.

cards.name: Silent-Blade Oni
cards.oracleText:
Ninjutsu {4}{U}{B} ({4}{U}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, look at that player's hand. You may cast a spell from among those cards without paying its mana cost.

cards.name: Mulldrifter
cards.oracleText:
Flying
When this creature enters, draw two cards.
Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)

cards.name: Ninja of the Deep Hours
cards.oracleText:
Ninjutsu {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Sigiled Starfish
cards.oracleText: {T}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

cards.name: Pilgrim's Eye
cards.oracleText:
Flying
When this creature enters, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.name: Terminus
cards.oracleText:
Put all creatures on the bottom of their owners' libraries.
Miracle {W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

cards.name: Entreat the Angels
cards.oracleText:
Create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying.
Miracle {X}{W}{W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

cards.name: Army of the Damned
cards.oracleText:
Create thirteen tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
Flashback {7}{B}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Akroma's Vengeance
cards.oracleText:
Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Devastation Tide
cards.oracleText:
Return all nonland permanents to their owners' hands.
Miracle {1}{U} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

cards.name: Dream Cache
cards.oracleText: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand both on top of your library or both on the bottom of your library.

cards.name: Ponder
cards.oracleText:
Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Portent
cards.oracleText:
Look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put them back in any order. You may have that player shuffle.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

cards.name: Treasure Hunt
cards.oracleText: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card, then put all cards revealed this way into your hand.

cards.name: Utter End
cards.oracleText: Exile target nonland permanent.

cards.name: Banishing Stroke
cards.oracleText:
Put target artifact, creature, or enchantment on the bottom of its owner's library.
Miracle {W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

cards.name: Return to Dust
cards.oracleText: Exile target artifact or enchantment. If you cast this spell during your main phase, you may exile up to one other target artifact or enchantment.

cards.name: Brainstorm
cards.oracleText: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

cards.name: Predict
cards.oracleText: Choose a card name, then target player mills a card. If a card with the chosen name was milled this way, you draw two cards. Otherwise, you draw a card.

cards.name: Telling Time
cards.oracleText: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand, one on top of your library, and one on the bottom of your library.

cards.name: Esper Charm
cards.oracleText:
Choose one —
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Draw two cards.
• Target player discards two cards.

cards.name: Mortify
cards.oracleText: Destroy target creature or enchantment.

cards.name: Commander's Sphere
cards.oracleText:
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.

cards.name: Crystal Ball
cards.oracleText: {1}, {T}: Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Mind Stone
cards.oracleText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.

cards.oracleText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

cards.name: Sol Ring
cards.oracleText: {T}: Add {C}{C}.

cards.name: Lightform
cards.oracleText:
When this enchantment enters, it becomes an Aura with enchant creature. Manifest the top card of your library and attach this enchantment to it. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
Enchanted creature has flying and lifelink.

cards.name: Cloudform
cards.oracleText:
When this enchantment enters, it becomes an Aura with enchant creature. Manifest the top card of your library and attach this enchantment to it. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
Enchanted creature has flying and hexproof.

cards.name: Varina, Lich Queen
cards.oracleText:
Whenever you attack with one or more Zombies, draw that many cards, then discard that many cards. You gain that much life.

cards.name: Yennett, Cryptic Sovereign
cards.oracleText:
Flying, vigilance, menace
Whenever Yennett attacks, reveal the top card of your library. You may cast it without paying its mana cost if its mana value is odd. If you don't cast it, draw a card.

cards.name: Boreas Charger
cards.oracleText:
Flying
When this creature leaves the battlefield, choose an opponent who controls more lands than you. Search your library for a number of Plains cards equal to the difference, reveal those cards, put one of them onto the battlefield tapped and the rest into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.name: Magus of the Balance
cards.oracleText: {4}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Each player chooses a number of lands they control equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.

cards.name: Aminatou's Augury
cards.oracleText: Exile the top eight cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield. Until end of turn, for each nonland card type, you may cast a spell of that type from among the exiled cards without paying its mana cost.

cards.name: Primordial Mist
cards.oracleText:
At the beginning of your end step, you may manifest the top card of your library. (Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
Exile a face-down permanent you control face up: You may play that card this turn. (You still pay its costs. Timing rules still apply.)

cards.name: Entreat the Dead
cards.oracleText:
Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Miracle {X}{B}{B} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

cards.name: Night Incarnate
cards.oracleText:
Deathtouch
When this creature leaves the battlefield, all creatures get -3/-3 until end of turn.
Evoke {3}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)

cards.name: Skull Storm
cards.oracleText:
When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you've cast your commander from the command zone this game.
Each opponent sacrifices a creature of their choice. Each opponent who can't loses half their life, rounded up.

cards.name: Sower of Discord
cards.oracleText:
Flying
As this creature enters, choose two players.
Whenever damage is dealt to one of the chosen players, the other chosen player also loses that much life.

cards.name: Yuriko, the Tiger's Shadow
cards.oracleText:
Commander ninjutsu {U}{B} ({U}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand or the command zone tapped and attacking.)
Whenever a Ninja you control deals combat damage to a player, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. Each opponent loses life equal to that card's mana value.

cards.name: Isolated Watchtower
cards.oracleText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}: Scry 1, then you may reveal the top card of your library. If a basic land card is revealed this way, put it onto the battlefield tapped. Activate only if an opponent controls at least two more lands than you.

cards.name: Aethermage's Touch
cards.oracleText: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. It gains "At the beginning of your end step, return this creature to its owner's hand." Then put the rest of the cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Loyal Unicorn
cards.oracleText:
Vigilance
Lieutenant — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to creatures you control this turn. Other creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.

cards.name: Loyal Subordinate
cards.oracleText:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Lieutenant — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, each opponent loses 3 life.

cards.name: Geode Golem
cards.oracleText:
Trample
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may cast your commander from the command zone without paying its mana cost. (You still pay any additional costs.)

cards.name: Forge of Heroes
cards.oracleText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Choose target commander that entered this turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it if it's a creature and a loyalty counter on it if it's a planeswalker.

cards.name: Crib Swap
cards.oracleText:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Exile target creature. Its controller creates a 1/1 colorless Shapeshifter creature token with changeling.
